# automatic

**Type Property**

The automatic limit behavior.

## Declaration

```swift
static var automatic: ValueAlignedLimitBehavior { get }
```

## Discussion

By default, the behavior will be limited for scroll views that are compact along the scrollable axis.
title: automatic
